title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mary Kay Cabot on Watson Trade, Contract, Backlash, Suspension // Baker Divorce, Trade Market, Senior Bowl Red Flags
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Mary Kay Cabot on Watson Trade, Contract, Backlash, Suspension // Baker Divorce, Trade Market, Senior Bowl Red Flags
description:
Colin has thoughts on Deshaun Watson to the Browns (3:00), a prime landing spot for Baker Mayfield, the severe backlash that will come from the Watson signing, and why it still may not be enough to win the AFC North. He also explains why the Packers could be in bigtime trouble without Davante Adams, if it's realistic for Matt Stafford to overtake Aaron Rodgers on the all-time QB list, and if Coach Cal will ever be held accountable for his Kentucky failures.

Then, longtime Browns beat writer Mary Kay Cabot joins Colin to discuss the public divorce between Baker and the Browns (20:00), when the relationship became too toxic to run it back (24:00), why the public parting with Odell Beckham Jr was the beginning of the end for Baker (26:00), which of GM Andrew Berry, Kevin Stefanski, or Jimmy Haslam soured on him first (29:00), the biggest obstacle to getting him out of town (31:00), why the Browns felt comfortable signing Watson despite sexual assault allegations (36:00), how they are preparing to handle the public backlash (38:00), what the organization is expecting for a likely suspension (40:00), when Browns fans turned on Baker for good (46:00), and what Mary Kay saw all the way back at the Senior Bowl that gave her reservations about the Browns drafting him 1st overall (49:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
